readable.title: 523692399_d2e261a302
readable.content: A girl performs skateboarding tricks in an arena for skateboarders , while wearing a helmet . A man wears a black helmet and is on a black skateboard . A shirtless skateboarder . A skateboarder wearing a grey helmet is riding his board along a concrete curve . A view from the top of a skateboarder at the top of a ramp .
